text: definitions developed waterfront amend the introductory paragraph of rsa i to read as follows developed waterfront property means any parcel of land upon which stands a structure suitable for either seasonal or human occupancy where such parcel of land is contiguous to or within feet of the reference line as defined in rsa xvii of waterfront property sale site assessment study amend rsa v to read as follows the site assessment study shall consist of sections new paragraph submission and approval of plans and specifications amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iii the following new paragraph nothing in this section shall be construed to limit or modify the authority conferred upon local governments under rsa to require more stringent standards for developed waterfront property than required by department administrative rules or rsa
